org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.routing

Interface ContractDefinition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContractDefinitionImpl

    public interface ContractDefinition
    Definition of the Contract A data structure that represents the contract that will be executed in the chaincode. Primarily has Name - either defined by the Contract annotation or the Class name (can be referred to as Namespace) Default - is the default contract (defined by the Default annotation) TxFunctions in this contract do not need the name prefix when invoked TxFunctions - the transaction functions defined in this contract Will embedded the ContgractInterface instance, as well as the annotation itself, and the routing for any tx function that is unkown
